tool_description: Provides daily motivatonal, wellness, and inspirational quotes and tips for mentan and physial well being
name: Positivity Tips
title: Positivity Tips

api_list.name: Get an Affirmation to Empower the User
api_list.description: Gets a random affirmation to provide robust inner empowerment through the internalization of affirmations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://positivity-tips.p.rapidapi.com/api/positivity/affirmation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "positivity-tips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
